mapper.insert: insert into COLLOBORATE.USER_TABLE(FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, EMAIL, MOBILE, SEX, USERNAME, PASSWORD) values(#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{sex}, #{userName}, #{password})
mapper.select: select SF.*, SFM.SHAREDWITH, U.LASTNAME AS OWNERLNAME, U.FIRSTNAME AS OWNERFNAME from COLLOBORATE.SHARED_FILES SF, COLLOBORATE.SHARE_FILES_MAPPING SFM, COLLOBORATE.USER_TABLE U where SFM.SHAREDWITH= #{userName} AND SFM.FILENAME = SF.FILENAME AND SF.SHAREDBY = U.USERNAME
mapper.delete: delete from COLLOBORATE.SHARED_FILES where fileName=#{fileName} and sharedBy=#{userName}
mapper.select: select SF.FILEPATH,SF.SHAREDBY, SFM.*, U.LASTNAME AS OWNERLNAME, U.FIRSTNAME AS OWNERFNAME from COLLOBORATE.SHARE_FILES_MAPPING SFM,COLLOBORATE.SHARED_FILES SF, COLLOBORATE.USER_TABLE U where SFM.SHAREDUSER=#{userName} AND SFM.SHAREDUSER = SF.SHAREDBY AND SFM.SHAREDUSER = U.USERNAME AND SFM.FILENAME = #{fileName} AND SF.FILENAME =SFM.FILENAME
mapper.delete: delete from COLLOBORATE.SHARE_FILES_MAPPING where fileName=#{fileName} and sharedWith=#{sharedWith} and sharedUser=#{userName}
